name: Into the Canvas
description:
Adventure into an elegant world of different art styles and mediums. Utilize both combat and platforming to explore unseen secrets, collect pickups, and defeat enemies. Into the Canvas features over a dozen different rooms filled with unique platforming and combat challenges. The player must wall jump and dash through intertwining labyrinths of obstacles and passageways if they hope to make it to the end of the castle. Gather collectibles that will increase the player’s stats and explore the castle’s every nook and cranny in an epic journey to master the arts.

This game was made by a small team of 4 people as a class project for UW-Stout. Leave a comment and let us know how you like our game! This is our first release :)

Credits:
